footer.tagline: The intelligence of movement. Personalized fitness, powered by AI.

about.title: About TvarX
about.subtitle: Every body tells a story. We use intelligence to listen, learn, and empower.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At TvarX, we believe that fitness should be as unique as you are. No two bodies are the same, and neither should be their training programs. We've harnessed the power of artificial intelligence to create something revolutionary: a fitness companion that understands your body, adapts to your progress, and evolves with your goals.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to democratize personalized fitness. Whether you're a beginner taking your first steps or an elite athlete pushing boundaries, TvarX meets you where you are and guides you to where you want to be. We combine cutting-edge AI with proven exercise science to deliver training plans that are not just effective, but safe, sustainable, and inspiring.
mission.paragraph3: Every body tells a story. We use intelligence to listen, learn, and empower. That's not just our tagline—it's our promise.

aiModel.title: AI Training Model
aiModel.description: Our proprietary AI algorithm analyzes thousands of data points—from your fitness level and goals to your recovery patterns and preferences. It continuously learns from your progress, adjusting workouts in real-time to optimize results while preventing injury and burnout.

privacy.title: Data Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your health data belongs to you. We use end-to-end encryption and never sell your information. All data is collected with explicit consent and can be removed at any time. We're compliant with GDPR, HIPAA, and other privacy regulations to ensure your information stays safe.

science.title: Scientific Foundation
science.description: Every recommendation is backed by exercise science and reviewed by our team of sports medicine professionals. We combine the latest research with practical experience to ensure your training is both effective and safe.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate experts in fitness, AI, and human wellness

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Where we've been and where we're going

careers.title: Join Us
careers.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our vision of making personalized fitness accessible to everyone. If you're excited about AI, fitness, or building products that change lives, we'd love to hear from you.
